name: clover fields
description:
clover fields

a small world project for ludum dare 38. watch the small armies fight to the death (no win state, just enjoy the show).

controls:

1 = battle stage

2 = empty stage

MB_LEFT = spawn white

MB_RIGHT = spawn yellow

R = restart stage

ESC = exit

minimum res: 1366 x 768 (1280 x 720 game window)
